languages.text:
"Та пасть, что поглощает смельчаков,
И лишь немногих выпускает вновь.
Сей зев тебе уже знаком, Купец:
Он битв твоих начало и конец".

traits.locale_text:
"Та пасть, что поглощает смельчаков,
И лишь немногих выпускает вновь.
Сей зев тебе уже знаком, Купец:
Он битв твоих начало и конец".
traits.speaker: Zanni

languages.text:
"The greedy mouth that swallows brave and bold,
And after few releases from its hold,
The Vagabond this maw already knows,
Why, to your fights it marks the start and close."
languages.original_text:
"Та пасть, что поглощает смельчаков,
И лишь немногих выпускает вновь.
Сей зев тебе уже знаком, Купец:
Он битв твоих начало и конец".

languages.text:
“贪婪的巨口，吞噬勇敢之人，
只有极少数的战士得以幸存。
这张巨口，四处漂泊的商人已然见过，
对这场战斗而言，它既是开端，也是终末。”
languages.original_text:
"The greedy mouth that swallows brave and bold,
And after few releases from its hold,
The Vagabond this maw already knows,
Why, to your fights it marks the start and close."

traits.locale_text:
“贪婪的巨口，吞噬勇敢之人，
只有极少数的战士得以幸存。
这张巨口，四处漂泊的商人已然见过，
对这场战斗而言，它既是开端，也是终末。”
traits.speaker: Zanni

languages.text:
«Las fauces ávidas que devoran a los osados,
y, tras pasar repetidamente por su control,
{mf|el|la} Errante ya conoce su interior,
pues de sus combates proclama su inicio y acabado».
languages.original_text:
"The greedy mouth that swallows brave and bold,
And after few releases from its hold,
The Vagabond this maw already knows,
Why, to your fights it marks the start and close."

traits.locale_text:
«Las fauces ávidas que devoran a los osados,
y, tras pasar repetidamente por su control,
{mf|el|la} Errante ya conoce su interior,
pues de sus combates proclama su inicio y acabado».
traits.speaker: Zanni

languages.text:
「勇敢で大胆な者を飲み込む貪欲な口
幾度の咀嚼から逃れた時
放浪者はマウを知る
君の戦いの終わりと始まりを告げる」
languages.original_text:
"The greedy mouth that swallows brave and bold,
And after few releases from its hold,
The Vagabond this maw already knows,
Why, to your fights it marks the start and close."

traits.locale_text:
「勇敢で大胆な者を飲み込む貪欲な口
幾度の咀嚼から逃れた時
放浪者はマウを知る
君の戦いの終わりと始まりを告げる」
traits.speaker: Zanni

languages.text:
"Gieriger Mund die Mutigen verschluckt,
er hat auch Euch schon mehrfach ausgespuckt.
Es kennt das böse Maul der Vagabund.
Anfang Eures Kampfs ist und End, der Mund."
languages.original_text:
"The greedy mouth that swallows brave and bold,
And after few releases from its hold,
The Vagabond this maw already knows,
Why, to your fights it marks the start and close."

traits.locale_text:
"Gieriger Mund die Mutigen verschluckt,
er hat auch Euch schon mehrfach ausgespuckt.
Es kennt das böse Maul der Vagabund.
Anfang Eures Kampfs ist und End, der Mund."
traits.speaker: Zanni

languages.text:
« La gueule avide qui avale les fous et les vaillants.
Ayant plusieurs fois franchi ses mâchoires,
{mf|Le Vagabond|La Vagabonde} devrait déjà le savoir,
Car elle marque le début et la fin des affrontements. »
languages.original_text:
"The greedy mouth that swallows brave and bold,
And after few releases from its hold,
The Vagabond this maw already knows,
Why, to your fights it marks the start and close."

traits.locale_text:

{mf|Le Vagabond|La Vagabonde} devrait déjà le savoir,
Car elle marque le début et la fin des affrontements. »
traits.speaker: Zanni

languages.text:
"O tamahkâr ağız, cesur ve gözü pekleri yutar,
Sonrasında pek azı, onun pençelerinden kaçar.
Pek Berduş; ağız bilir hâlihazırda neler vuku bulur,
Savaşlarında başlangıç ve bitiş neden ondan sorulur."
languages.original_text:
"The greedy mouth that swallows brave and bold,
And after few releases from its hold,
The Vagabond this maw already knows,
Why, to your fights it marks the start and close."

traits.locale_text:

Sonrasında pek azı, onun pençelerinden kaçar.
Pek Berduş, ağız bilir hâlihazırda neler vuku bulur,
Savaşlarında başlangıç ve bitiş neden ondan sorulur."
traits.speaker: Zanni
